revision.text:
{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Amped Wireless |model=SR300 |revision= |upc=850214003010 |ean= |asin=B004NBL9WK |price= |est_release_date= |fcc_date=04/18/2012 |manuf_country=Taiwan |manuf=Loopcomm |manuf_model= |manuf_rev= |availability= |type=repeater |fcc_id=ZTT-SR300 |ic_id=10233A-SR300 |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=1 |pwr_conn=barrel |pwr_barrel_inner= |pwr_barrel_outer= |pwr_barrel_len= |pwr_vac= |pwr_pol= |pwr_poe= |cpu1_brand=Realtek |cpu1_model=RTL8196C |cpu1_cspeed= |cpu2_brand= |cpu2_model= |cpu2_cspeed= |fla1= |fla1_brand= |fla1_model= |fla1_num= |fla2= |fla2_brand= |fla2_model= |fla2_num= |ram1= |ram1_brand=Zentel |ram1_model= |ram1_num= |ram2= |ram2_brand= |ram2_model= |ram2_num= |expansion_if_types= |expansion_pcmcia_num= |expansion_expresscard_num= |expansion_minipci_num= |expansion_minipcie_num= |expansion_usb_num= |jtag= |serial= |wi1_module= |wi1_module_if= |wi1_chip1_brand=Realtek |wi1_chip1_model= |wi1_chip2_brand= |wi1_chip2_model= |wi1_chip3_brand= |wi1_chip3_model= |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_ant_conn=RP-SMA |wi1_txchains=2 |wi1_rxchains=2 |wi1_sstreams=2 |wi2_module= |wi2_module_if= |wi2_chip1_brand= |wi2_chip1_model= |wi2_chip2_brand= |wi2_chip2_model= |wi2_chip3_brand= |wi2_chip3_model= |wi2_802dot11_protocols= |wi2_ant_conn= |wi2_txchains= |wi2_rxchains= |wi2_sstreams= |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip1_brand= |eth_chip1_model= |eth_chip2_brand= |eth_chip2_model= |eth_chip3_brand= |eth_chip3_model= |sw_cpu=true |sw_brand= |sw_model= |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=5 |wan_ports= |flags= |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=bgn |default_ssid=Amped_Wireless |default_ssid_regex=^Amped_Wireless$ |default_ip=192.168.1.240 |default_user= |default_pass= |oui=F8:78:8C |oui_eth=F8:78:8C }} ''High Power Wireless-300N Smart Repeater''
[http://www.ampedwireless.com/products/sr300.html Product page]
[http://www.ampedwireless.com/datasheets/Amped_SR300_Datasheet_LR.pdf Datasheet]
[http://www.ampedwireless.com/datasheets/support/SR300_UsersGuide.pdf User's Guide] The device is presumed to use RTL8196C. It probably also uses RTL8192CE. "LPC0014 REV:2.2" is silkscreened on the board. The default WPA key is '''wireless'''. The SSID is shown as lower case on the FCC photos.. but the manual (and WiGLE data) indicates that Amped and Wireless are capitalized. OUI appears to be F8:78:8C (should probably be F8:7B:8C, and may be in some instances) :no FCC ID on a device label with this OUI...
